model.name: CustomeView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW CUSTOMER ( FIRSTNAME string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'firstname'), LASTNAME string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'lastname') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'customer') AS SELECT PG_SOURCE.customer.firstname, PG_SOURCE.customer.lastname FROM PG_SOURCE.customer UNION ALL SELECT MS_SOURCE.CUSTOMER.FIRSTNAME, MS_SOURCE.CUSTOMER.LASTNAME FROM MS_SOURCE.CUSTOMER;

model.name: PG_SOURCE
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE customer ( ssn string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ssn"', NATIVE_TYPE 'bpchar', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), firstname string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"firstname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), lastname string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"lastname"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), CONSTRAINT customer_pk PRIMARY KEY(ssn) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."customer"')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE pgtable1 ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'serial', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), field1 string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"field1"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), field2 string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"field2"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), CONSTRAINT pgtable1_pk PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."pgtable1"')

model.name: MS_SOURCE
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CUSTOMER ( SSN string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`SSN`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), FIRSTNAME string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`FIRSTNAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LASTNAME string(64) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`LASTNAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT CUSTOMER_PK PRIMARY KEY(SSN) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`jdv`.`CUSTOMER`')
